General.Name: Hanmi Pharm Co Ltd
General.Description: Hanmi Pharm. Co., Ltd. operates as a pharmaceutical company worldwide. It develops treatments for diabetes, obesity, cancer, autoimmune, and rare diseases. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
